name: Spellarium 2
description:
That's the Part 2 of our successfull Spellarium series. Our world consists of 6 elements: the Earth, Water,Fire,Light,Darkness and Water. So, we need to create the 7th element.
The game has 110 Match 3 levels plus Solitaires, Spot the Difference and Hidden Objects scenes.
Plus a nice town to build.
